steps.title: Pitch Glide
steps.copy: Glide smoothly up, then down. Aim for steady movement (no sudden jumps).

realtime.jitterMsg: Imagine drawing one lineâ€”no dots. Glide gently through the middle.
realtime.targetMsg: Try a slower sweepâ€”small steps, smooth and connected.

steps.title: Prosody Phrase
steps.copy: Say: "How are you doing?" with a gentle rise at the end.

pre: Goal: a gentle upward lilt on the last word.

realtime.jitterMsg: Think 'one easy line'â€”slow it down slightly.
realtime.phraseEndMsg: Get ready for that gentle rise on the last word...
